name: Cross the Highway - PC Edition
description:
Cross the Highway is an addictive arcade-style dodge-and-collect game. Challenge your reflexes by moving a kitten across a busy highway and catching birds without getting hit by oncoming cars. The more birds you swipe, the higher your score flies. But don’t take your eyes off the road. Stay in one lane too long, and it’ll be game over!

HOW TO PLAY:

1) Press “Play”
2) Tap on any of the four lanes to move your kitten
3) Change lanes to dodge cars and catch birds
4) Rack up points the longer you stay in the game
5) Set a high score, and then try to beat it!

FEATURES:

★ Simple, streamlined gameplay
★ Classic, colorful graphics 
★ Background audio to put you right in the scene
★ Track your high scores
★ 100% free to play!

-----------------------------------------------------
